content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 350.7 - Responsibility of a social services district at the time of application interview

State Regulations

At the time of the application interview the social
services district shall inform the applicant of: (a) the eligibility requirements of the
program under which he is applying for assistance or care; (b) his responsibility for reporting all
facts material to a proper determination of eligibility; (c) the joint responsibility of the local
department and the applicant for exploring all facts concerning eligibility, needs and resources, and the applicant's responsibility for securing, wherever
possible, records or documents to support his statements; (d) the kinds of verification
needed; (e) the fact that any
investigation essential to the determination of eligibility will be
undertaken; (f) his responsibility
for notifying the local department immediately of all changes in circumstances; and
(g) the availability of
assistance and/or service under some other program, either public or private, if the applicant appears eligible therefor. Notes
